summary: Project now includes user authentication/authorization with a login page and biometric authentication to address current permission/unauthorized access issues.
architectural_notes: Introduce authentication + authorization layer: users, roles/permissions; protect entry CRUD endpoints accordingly.
Login UI + session/token handling; biometric auth integrates with the login/session flow.
known_issues: Current entry CRUD actions fail due to missing/incorrect user permission/authorization, triggering "Failed to Load Entries".

existing_features.title: Add a dedicated frontend login/unauthorized gating flow: if the user is not authenticated with Internet Identity, show a login screen; if authenticated but not registered/authorized yet, show a lightweight registration screen; otherwise show the existing app tabs.
Add “biometric” support to the login experience by using Internet Identity in a way that supports passkeys/biometric unlock on compatible devices, and reflect this in the UI copy.

Apply a consistent, performance-minded visual theme to the new auth pages (login/registration) and any new navigation elements (e.g., logout/account summary) without changing the core product features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement user accounts and role/permission system for backend access control (authorize create/read/update/delete entry APIs).
Add a login page and authentication flow for users.
Add biometric authentication (e.g., fingerprint/Face ID) support as part of login/unlock flow.
Implement a user account concept on the backend where an authenticated principal can be registered as an application user, and entry/profile APIs authorize based on that user permission.
Add admin-only backend APIs to manage user permissions/roles for principals (at minimum: grant and revoke the “user” permission; optionally list registered users).

projectName: Add user registration, role/permission management, login UI, and biometric-friendly authentication via Internet Identity
